Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-13193 affecting package libvirt for versions less than 10.0.0-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-13193 affecting package libvirt for versions less than 10.0.0-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libvirt is earlier than 10.0.0-6, affected by CVE-2025-13193
